title: fixes and additions
body:
not sure what to do about [update skia to fork](https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/commit/63e07c746e50e7d5a7b9917692396f4b9f5e519c)

[add GenerationID, ComputeIsOpaque, SetInfo](https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/commit/1c5b99e9653de95fa977a7ae3adee9638586e2e5)

[fix broken dependancies for generator](https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/commit/abe791957c3b53ca4ff654ac2d04cfdcde71e42a)

[make sure msbuild 17 (VS 2022) exists when building](https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/commit/319ea3e9ea196672dc5124da4037f0aa54ef8d16)

[add static SKImageInfo.Make methods for ease of porting native code](https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/commit/2abb0a4c2da38d92ee559bc02a072e1dfed01e00)

lots of other stuff - https://github.com/mono/Skia/pull/87

lots of other stuff that i cannot split into seperate PR's
